CustomField.description: The total count of successful (completed donations) visits for a Donor since he / she joined the Campaign, until the Campaign End Date. This is set automatically by code, based on Status = Complete and Outcome = Donation visits for the Campaign Member Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total count of successful (completed donations) visits for a Donor since he / she joined the Campaign, until the Campaign End Date.
CustomField.label: Eligible Donation Count
